name: Stegami
description: Java desktop application that allows the user to completely conceal one image into another using steganography.

name: CSport
description: A competitive programming website contains a ranking system that encouage coders to solve questions at any moments rather then only through contests.

name: Mandelbrot Set Explorer
description: A responsive web page, which displays successive magnification of the Mandelbrot Set. Use web worker to run intensive computations while maintaining the previous calculation to reduce latency.

name: Interactive World Map
description: An interactive application to show demographic statistics using APIs for live data, which is developed in a 24-hours hackathon with tkinter.

name: Rocket Trajectory Simulation
description: An application to simulate the trajectory path of an object in space by applying Newton's law of universal gravitation
